name: Gemini CLI
description: Installs Gemini CLI, and needed dependencies.

version.description: Select or enter a Gemini CLI version to install

geminifiles.description: A git repository URL to clone for gemini-cli configuration. It is expected to have an install.sh at the root.

keep_google_api_credentials.description: If true, persists Google API credentials across container rebuilds by storing them in a volume. Note: this parameter is for Google OAuth sessions. Does not cover API Keys or Vertex AI (gcloud) authentication.

google_api_credentials_persist_dir.description: The directory where Google API credentials will be persisted when keep_google_api_credentials is enabled.

extensions.description: A comma-separated list of Gemini CLI extensions to install (e.g., 'https://github.com/gemini-cli-extensions/conductor').
